滑铁卢车站（英文：Waterloo station）是英国伦敦一个重要的铁路与交通转运的共站铁路车站，位于伦敦兰贝斯区，靠近南岸的地方 …

Sentence.sentence: The study's authors, Joanne Wood and John Lee of the University of Waterloo and Elaine Perunovic of the University of New Brunswick, begin by citing older research showing that when people get feedback which they believe is overly positive, they actually feel worse, not better.
